DATA_KATEX.//description: Found LaTex formulas in the data-katex html class

DATA_TABLE.//description: Found tables in the table html class

DATA_TABLE_CELL.//description: Found end of Cells in the tr html table class

PARAGRAPH_END.//description: Found paragraphs end in the html

PARAGRAPH_END-DOT.//description: Found text like .§ in the html

MULTIPLE_END_PARAGRAPHS.//description: Found multiple new paragraphs in the html

MULTIPLE_END_PARAGRAPHS_IN_END_LABDOC.//description: Found §§ in the end of a labdoc

COMA_NUMBERS.//description: Found a coma in a number (ex. '1,000')

MATH_OP_EXTRA_SPACES.//description: Found an operator with extra spaces (ex. 'a = b')

SI_UNITS_SPACE.//description: Found a space between a number and a SI unit (ex. 1 m)

BRACKETS_SPACES._description: Found a space between round, square and curly brackets and a text (ex. '(a)'

WORD_SPACES_COMA-DOT.\\description: Found a space between a word and a coma or dot (ex. hello  .)

COMA_WORD.\\description: Found a coma paste in word (ex. ',hello')

WORD_COLON.\\description: Found a colon paste in word (ex. 'hello:  ')
